metadata.title: CVE-2014-9324 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The GenericInterface in OTRS Help Desk 3.2.x before 3.2.17, 3.3.x before3.3.11, and 4.0.x before 4.0.3 allows remote authenticated users to accessand modify arbitrary tickets via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
